option_1: Such mechanisms may be implemented as virtual memory VMware or physical memory PAL Memory management units MMUs are software programs that manage the resources of a computer system for execution by an application Such resources may include inputoutput IO ports storage devices and network connections Memory Management Unit NMU is a software program that manages a NMUs resources and communicates with a host computer
option_2: Such dynamically obtained memory resources are known as virtual addresses Such memory addresses are preferably located in the memory space to be used by a particular application virtualized addresses can be used to avoid the allocation of all physical memory resources to one application At any time all virtualized addresses can be allocated to one application memory resources can be allocated without affecting other applications
